name: Ultrawings
description: Ultrawings is an aerial-themed, open-world flight game where you use your virtual hands to fly multiple aircraft to complete a variety of missions across a beautiful, island-themed world!
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 Processor: Intel-i3-6100 or equivalent Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 960 or equivalent DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space
